title: Topic 004 Question 008
body: Your company receives PSTN services in Microsoft Teams through a derived Direct Routing trunk from a telephone carrier.
The carrier becomes an operator in the Operator Connect program.
You need to migrate the users to Operator Connect.
Which three actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Run the Set-CsUser cmdlet and set the ג€"OnPremLineURI parameter to $null.
Run the Grant-CsOnlineVoiceRoutingPolicy cmdlet and set the ג€"Policyname parameter to Policy1.
Run the Grant-CsOnlineVoiceRoutingPolicy cmdlet and set the ג€"Policyname parameter to $null.
Run the Set-CsOnlineVoiceUser cmdlet and set the ג€"TelephoneNumber parameter to each user's phone number.
Run the Set-CsOnlineVoiceUser cmdlet and set the ג€"TelephoneNumber parameter to $null.
Run the Set-CsUser cmdlet and set the ג€"OnPremLineURI parameter to each user's phone number.
